delete_token.description: Any piece of content signed with the user's private key

delete_token_format.description: Format of the submitted delete token
delete_token_format.error: Must be one of the values: 'json', 'xml'

delete_token_encoding.description: Encoding of the submitted delete token. Currently we only support "jwt"
